item.title: CheckDot

item.description:
The CheckDot platform is an essential checkpoint for the verification for any cryptocurrency project and more. CheckDot has the ambition to be the first decentralized platform of opinions in various fields: Projects, companies, forms, code and more. Furthermore, CheckDot makes it possible to create requests for advice or audits involving one or two layers of […]

The post CheckDot appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
The CheckDot platform is an essential checkpoint for the verification for any cryptocurrency project and more.

CheckDot has the ambition to be the first decentralized platform of opinions in various fields: Projects, companies, forms, code and more. Furthermore, CheckDot makes it possible to create requests for advice or audits involving one or two layers of advisors.

The post CheckDot appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: InsurAce
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
InsurAce is a decentralized insurance protocol, aiming to provide reliable, robust and carefree DeFi insurance services to the DeFi users, with very low premium and sustainable investment returns.

The post InsurAce appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: YAM V3
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
Yam is an experimental protocol building upon the most exciting innovations in programmable money and governance. Built by a team of DeFi natives, it seeks to create: an elastic supply to seek eventual price stability a governable treasury to further support stability fully on-chain governance to enable decentralized control and evolution from Day 1 a […]

The post YAM V3 appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
Yam is an experimental protocol building upon the most exciting innovations in programmable money and governance. Built by a team of DeFi natives, it seeks to create:

  • an elastic supply to seek eventual price stability
  • a governable treasury to further support stability
  • fully on-chain governance to enable decentralized control and evolution from Day 1
  • a fair distribution mechanism that incentivizes key community members to actively take the reins of governance

At its core, YAM is an elastic supply cryptocurrency, which expands and contracts its supply in response to market conditions, initially targeting 1 USD per YAM. This stability mechanism includes one key addition to existing elastic supply models such as Ampleforth: a portion of each supply expansion is used to buy yCurve (a high-yield USD-denominated stablecoin) and add it to the Yam treasury, which is controlled via Yam community governance.

The post YAM V3 appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: Bridge Mutual
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
Bridge Mutual is a decentralized, discretionary p2p/p2b insurance platform that provides coverage for stablecoins, centralized exchanges, and smart contracts. Its platform allows users to provide insurance coverage, decide on insurance payouts, and get compensated for taking part in the ecosystem.

The post Bridge Mutual appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
Bridge Mutual is a decentralized, discretionary p2p/p2b insurance platform that provides coverage for stablecoins, centralized exchanges, and smart contracts. Its platform allows users to provide insurance coverage, decide on insurance payouts, and get compensated for taking part in the ecosystem.

The post Bridge Mutual appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: Helmet.insure
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
Helmet is a peer-to-peer price-shield insurance protocol on BSC, originated from option trading logic. Helmet allows users to create insurance policy of any cryptoasset in the market, protecting DeFi users against the risk of price fluctuations.

The post Helmet.insure appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
Helmet is a peer-to-peer price-shield insurance protocol on BSC, originated from option trading logic. Helmet allows users to create insurance policy of any cryptoasset in the market, protecting DeFi users against the risk of price fluctuations.

The post Helmet.insure appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: Nsure.Network
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
Nsure is an open insurance platform for Open Finance. The project borrows the idea of Lloyd’s London, a market place to trade insurance risks, where premiums are determined by a Dynamic Pricing Model. Capital mining will be implemented to secure capital required to back the risks at any point of time. A 3-phase crowd voting […]

The post Nsure.Network appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
Nsure is an open insurance platform for Open Finance. The project borrows the idea of Lloyd’s London, a market place to trade insurance risks, where premiums are determined by a Dynamic Pricing Model. Capital mining will be implemented to secure capital required to back the risks at any point of time. A 3-phase crowd voting mechanism is used to ensure every claim is handled professionally.

The post Nsure.Network appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: Serenity Shield
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
The $SERSH token powers the Serenity Shield’s StrongBox®️ DApp and future offerings within its secure platform, facilitating: Payment for Services: Users can settle fees for storage, subscriptions, and data transfer. Storage Contributions: It incentivizes users to allocate extra storage to the StrongBox network. Rewards and Loyalty: Frequent users and $SERSH holders enjoy benefits and discounts. […]

The post Serenity Shield appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
The $SERSH token powers the Serenity Shield’s StrongBox®️ DApp and future offerings within its secure platform, facilitating:

  • Payment for Services: Users can settle fees for storage, subscriptions, and data transfer.
  • Storage Contributions: It incentivizes users to allocate extra storage to the StrongBox network.
  • Rewards and Loyalty: Frequent users and $SERSH holders enjoy benefits and discounts.
  • Ecosystem Engagement: Enables access to various activities and partnered services.

The post Serenity Shield appeared first on CryptoSlate.
